column2: ENGLISH

It comes a time when every child comes of age. A ritual is partaken where toys, child clothing and other things that marked ones childhood, are gathered and burned. Marking the end of childhood and begging of adulthood.
It is time

Your child has come of age. Their passing into adulthood has to be celebrated with a ritual. Gather their toys and other symbols of their childhood, burn them. Let your child put its childhood behind and become an adult.
They grow up so fast

The ritual has started, your toys and other belongings are burned away. Entrance into adulthood is celebrated and the whole court has came to witness it. As per tradition, you are to choose your future partner, though in truth it's litte more than your childhood sweetheart.
The ritual has began!
This will increase your stat

The time has come for you to prove your right to become an adult. You will be left alone in the deep woods, forced to survive on your own, using your wit and skill. And when you come out, you'll be a independent adult. If of course, you survive.
There is no turning back now

Your child has come of age to partake in the ritual of becoming an adult. They will be left in the deep woods, to fend for themselves and survive on their own. Coming out as a real adult. Tell your farewells because not all children come back.
Come back to us, stay safe!

You have returned safe and sound! but the ritual of quickening has forge you into a new person, you have lost your childishness sense you had before, the innocence glow of a child is snuffed by wit of an adult.
Finally home!
While trying to steal food for yourself, you were cough red handed. Unable to escape, the men drag you to the floor and beat the living warp out of you.
Wont cry... it will pass... it will
You're going to curl up in a ball and hope they stop whipping your weak ass. You'll probably won't be in good shape after this.
Try to run away!
You'll use your high martial to try to out run them. Failing will not be good.
Talk your way out!
Your going to try to talk it out so you don't get you ass kicked, but you are out of luck when it comes to getting some food.
Your tummy aches, but you are in luck. You hear a commotion, following the noise you find travelers passing through. You see they carry supplies, food!
I am too weak, I will beg for food
Success will depend on your diplomacy skill and failing means no food
They still haven't discovered me, I will try to steal
Success will depend on your intrigue skill and failing means no food or worse
They seem a bit lost and I know this area very well. I could guide them
Success will depend on your stewardship skill and failing means no food
Ha, they are weak I am not. I will rob them
Success will depend on your martial skill and failing means no food or worse
You hear someone moving around, almost sneaking like. You move to hide and prepare, but lucky for you it is just a hunter cautiosly moving through the woods. He seems lost.
He is a hunter, he could tell me more about hunting
Option is based on your diplomacy skill and it can improve your martial
I still have the upper hand, I could wait till he falls asleep and steal from him
Success will depend on your intrigue skill and it can improve your intrigue, but failing means no food or worse
He is lost, I should help him and guide him
Option is based on your stewardship skill and it can improve stewardship
I still have the upper hand, I will ambush him
Success will depend on your martial skill and it can improve your martial, but failing means no food or worse

You hear whimpering somewhere close, barely heritable but it is definitely there. Could it be a trap? You slowly approach the direction from where the sound is coming, only to find a wounded kid. Another quickening participant, greatly wounded and crying.
I have to save him!
You can try to same him using your learning and if successful will increase your learning but you will not have any food to eat
You are already dead, I am taking your stuffe
this Option has a small chance to improve your intrigue
He has supplies he wont be need anymore
this Option has a small chance to improve your martial
It seems that not only the kid was heavily wounded but also starving. He has no food on him and if he doesn't die from wounds, he will from starvation.
No food...
Meat is back on the menu Boys!
You can hear your tummy grumbling, you are hungry. It is time to find food, through either gathering or hunting and feed yourself.
I will try to hunt
This option is based on martial
I will try to forage
This option is based on learning
I want my mommy to make me a stew, where is my mommy?
You start crying, rolling up on the ground, if you don't become too weak and die from starvation, the noise will probably attract a predator. You will die

You payed enough attention in those hunting lessons, maybe you will be capable of hunting by yourself. But you will have to decide how to take this on, day is running short and your tummy only grumbles more.
I will craft a weapon
Higher chance to gain martial but higher chance to fail
I will set traps, I can withstand till morning
Standard chance to gain martial but low chance to fail
I will hunt with whatever, a throwing stone will do if it has to
Standard chance to gain martial but high chance to fail
Those lessons about types of shrooms and berries should come handy now, then again did you really pay enough attention to know what is poisonous and what is edible?
These mushrooms look edible, no weird colors
High chance to gain learning but high chance to fail
Berries are a safer bet, I will gather those
Standard chance to gain learning but lower chancer to fail
These berries look fine... I guess
Standard chance to gain learning but high chance to fail
You have gotten yourself hurt. If you were back home someone would tend for you and kiss your boo-boo, but out here only the trees and beasts can hear your crying.
It's just a flesh wound!
Your martial is high enough to walk it off and you can increase martial, tho the wounds might cause complications
Herbal remedy, that can help me!
Your learning is high enough to heal yourself and you can increase learning, tho the wounds might cause complications
Tis but a scratch
Your martial is too low, high chance of increasing martial but high chance of getting maimed
I.. I can't... it hurts too much *Sniff*
You start crying, hoping that someone will hear your whipping, but there is no one to help. You die
The wild beasts that you were hunting was in fact hunting you and you have fallen into it's trap.
Please [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] let me survive
I can only hope that the smell of piss and shit keeps me from being eaten tonight
You have not yet been Doomed by a Doomsayer which is said to bring ill fortune. The ritual will take but a day and a small sacrifice to Morr.
I'm ready for Morr to give me my Dooming
I don't think being doomed by the god of death sounds like a good idea
Hungry
You feel hungry and should start seeking out food
Slight starvation
You are starting to feel a bit weak from lack of food. You should start seeking source of food imminently
Medium starvation
You are growing more weak by the hour, with no food you are on verge of starving to death
High starvation
You are skin and bones, it is only matter of time before you become too weak to move and die from starvation. You are going to die!
Dooming
Dooming
Terrible things will happen to thy fingers if thou dippest them into too many pies
Dooming
A four legged beast shall be thine death
Dooming
Thy end shall be hilarious, just not thee
Dooming
Thy shalt laugh in the face of death, but the last laugh shall be Morr's
Dooming
Thou shalt fall under the weight of thine own gold
Dooming
Beware the man that is not a man
Dooming
Good advice will arrive too late
Dooming
A drunken blunder shall end your comedy
Dooming
Thy doom is so terrible, mortal mind cannot conceive it, nor mortal tongue tell it
Dooming
Do not trust the rug
Dooming
A spear will pass through your belly and you will linger long in pain before your demise
Dooming
The hangman's noose, aye, or headsman's chop, shall end thy days
Dooming
Debauchery and revelry shall end in misery
Dooming
Disease and pestilence loom over thine nether regions
Dooming
It is a great honour to be made mad by the gods
Dooming
Morr comes screaming to thy door
Dooming
Madness and insanity shall haunt thy final hours
Dooming
Morr has got thy number
Dooming
Morr will come calling when thou art without clothing
Dooming
No tears but thy own shall be shed when Morr comes a-knocking
Dooming
Size matters not
Dooming
The hand that takes thy life is thine own
Dooming
Thy blood shall water a foreign field
Dooming
Thou shalt share thy grave with a dog
Dooming
Thy death shall mirror your birth
Dooming
Trust not gifts from the Border Princedoms
Dooming
When the bell tolls midnight, all shall not be well, as thy end awaits thee
Dooming
You die alone, unmourned and unloved
Dooming
When the birds start to sing, you shall forever be silent
Dooming
You will die, and yet walk on
Dooming
When thee dost hold a mans life in one hand, thy life shall be held in his
Dooming
The great maw shall devour thee
Dooming
Starvation shall reduce thee to an empty husk
Dooming
Sloppiness shall be thy undoing
Dooming
It'll fall off when you least expect it
Dooming
Fear shall be thy downfall
Dooming
Thou shall perish so others may live
Dooming
The more you complain, the longer Morr lets you live
Dooming
Beware of the Black mage, for he shall stab thee
Dooming
A child shall be Morr's herald
Dooming
Thy body may rot, but thy soul shall forever haunt the land
Dooming
Beware the black cat
Dooming
Beware the passing raven, for it doth herald the end
Dooming
Beware the lurkers in the dark
Dooming
Accident will happen
Dooming
All is not as it seems
Dooming
A small misfortune leads to a bigger misfortune which leads to thy death
Dooming
Among great celebration you shall leave this world
Dooming
That which does not kill you has delayed the inevitable
Dooming
Fear the fair maiden from the east
